subject: Hockey, Ice
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Montador, who died in February at age 35, is the fifth known former N.H.L. player to have had C.T.E., the disease associated with repeated hits to the head.
snippet: Montador, who died in February at age 35, is the fifth known former N.H.L. player to have had C.T.E., the disease associated with repeated hits to the head.
